description:
Wolffy, through his occasional discovery of the privacy and importance of the wardrobe, developed the "Wardrobe Internet" to enter the wardrobe of the little sheep, and succeeded in capturing the beautiful sheep and the warm sheep. Who knows that he was in a hurry to return home but collided with a small wardrobe and was blown out of the wardrobe Internet.
Thought a nightmare of the beautiful sheep and warm sheep woke up, but found a small wardrobe around the wounded, it is a wardrobe courier.
It turns out that there was a legend on the green grassland: which one of the residents who love to take care of the clothes with kindness and sincerity to the wardrobe wish, the wardrobe courier will be through the wardrobe Internet to wish clothes, to its wardrobe, not to complete the task of the wardrobe courier will not be able to return to the wardrobe Internet.
The sheep and the slow sheep who came to the wardrobe learnt the news and said they would like to help.
At this time, six gadgets jumped out of the wardrobe, they are: soft ruler "Pippi", washing board "spinning", knitting needles "pointed", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", "colourful", and "colourful". The colourful threads are "Little Rainbow", the beak scissors are "Big Mouth" and the magnifying glass is "Big Mirror".
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之衣橱大冒险

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Yichu Da Maoxian
喜羊羊与灰太狼之衣橱大冒险
